exam.question: If nothing is done to protect the environment, millions of species that are alive today will have become ______.

answer.explain: 句意： 如果我们对环境保护袖手旁观的话， 现在仍存在的数百万个物种都将遭遇灭绝。deteriorate： (使)恶化； suppress： 镇压； 抑制。

sentences.sContent: Inactivity can make your joints stiff, and the bones may begin to degenerate.
sentences.sCn: 不活动会使关节僵硬，骨骼因此可能会开始退化。

remMethod.val: de(变坏) ＋ gener(产生) ＋ ate → 产生了坏东西 → 衰退， 堕落

words.tran: 退化；[医] 变性；堕落；恶化
退化；[物] 简并；堕落；退步

trans.tranOther: someone whose behaviour is considered to be morally unacceptable
